meanings.sent1: She reedited her essay to fix the mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The author reedited the final draft before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: He reedited his speech so many times that he forgot the original version.
meanings.sent4: The artist reedited the painting, giving it a fresh perspective.
meanings.sent5: The student reedited the project to make it more polished and professional.

meanings.definition: To make changes to a film or recording by cutting, adding, or altering scenes.
meanings.sent1: The director reedited the movie to improve the pacing.
meanings.sent2: They reedited the documentary to include new interviews.
meanings.sent3: The editor reedited the film, accidentally creating a hilarious blooper reel.
meanings.sent4: She reedited the video, turning it into a captivating short film.
meanings.sent5: He reedited the audio track, enhancing the overall sound quality.
